summary: Provides a collection of geometric utilities for unstructured grid objects, handling calculations such as edge and face centroids, face center points, and conversions between spherical (longitude/latitude) and Cartesian (XYZ) coordinate systems, as well as algorithms for determining minimal enclosing circles.
business_intent: Enables accurate spatial representation and analysis of mesh-based geophysical data, supporting downstream modeling, visualization, and scientific workflows that rely on precise grid coordinate information.
